languages.text: "Тот след кровав и давно остыл, брат Ульфар. Ни к чему класть еще одну голову. Как вожак Грозовых укусов, зову тебя в нашу стаю. Будь нам братом".

"That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."
languages.original_text: "Тот след кровав и давно остыл, брат Ульфар. Ни к чему класть еще одну голову. Как вожак Грозовых укусов, зову тебя в нашу стаю. Будь нам братом".

traits.locale_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “狼群的脚印满是血迹，气味早已消散。没必要再徒增一具尸体了，乌尔法兄弟。身为噬风者的首领，我召唤你加入我们的狼群。成为我们的兄弟吧。”
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: “狼群的脚印满是血迹，气味早已消散。没必要再徒增一具尸体了，乌尔法兄弟。身为噬风者的首领，我召唤你加入我们的狼群。成为我们的兄弟吧。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「その痕跡は血塗られ、すっかり冷え切っているぞ、ブラザー・ウルファー。死体を増やすな。嵐喰いのリーダーとして、お前を我が群れに加える。これより同胞となろうぞ」
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: 「その痕跡は血塗られ、すっかり冷え切っているぞ、ブラザー・ウルファー。死体を増やすな。嵐喰いのリーダーとして、お前を我が群れに加える。これより同胞となろうぞ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Aquel rastro está manchado de sangre y se enfrió hace mucho, hermano Ulfar. No hay necesidad de sumar otra víctima más. Como líder de los Muerdetormentas, te invito a unirte a nuestra manada. Conviértete en nuestro hermano».
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: «Aquel rastro está manchado de sangre y se enfrió hace mucho, hermano Ulfar. No hay necesidad de sumar otra víctima más. Como líder de los Muerdetormentas, te invito a unirte a nuestra manada. Conviértete en nuestro hermano».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « C'est une piste sanglante qui s'est depuis longtemps refroidie, frère Ulfar. Tu n'as nul besoin d'ajouter un cadavre de plus à la liste de ses victimes. En tant que chef des Crocs de la tempête, je t'invite à te joindre à notre meute. Deviens l'un de nos frères. »
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une piste sanglante qui s'est depuis longtemps refroidie, frère Ulfar. Tu n'as nul besoin d'ajouter un cadavre de plus à la liste de ses victimes. En tant que chef des Crocs de la tempête, je t'invite à te joindre à notre meute. Deviens l'un de nos frères. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Diese Spur ist blutig und längst kalt, Bruder Ulfar. Ihr müsst ihr keine weitere Leiche hinzufügen. Als Anführer der Stormbiters rufe ich Euch in unser Rudel. Werdet einer unserer Brüder."
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Spur ist blutig und längst kalt, Bruder Ulfar. Ihr müsst ihr keine weitere Leiche hinzufügen. Als Anführer der Stormbiters rufe ich Euch in unser Rudel. Werdet einer unserer Brüder."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "O izler kanla lekelendi, zamana yenik düştü Kardeş Ulfar. Bu yola bir ceset daha eklemenin manası yok. Borayutanların lideri olarak seni sürümüze davet ediyorum. Gel, kardeşimiz ol."
languages.original_text: "That trail is bloody and has long since gone cold, Brother Ulfar. There is no need to add another body to its tally. As the leader of the Stormbiters, I call you to our pack. Be a brother to us now."

traits.locale_text: "O izler kanla lekelenmiş ve zamana yenik düşmüş Kardeş Ulfar. Bu yola bir ceset daha eklemenin manası yok. Borayutanların lideri olarak seni sürümüze davet ediyorum. Gel, bizim kardeşimiz ol."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
